trans-unit.source: Defines an abstract base class for composable part definitions, which describe and enable the creation of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of a part that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref> describes.

Derived types that override this method should return a new instance of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object every time that the method is invoked and should never return `null`.

Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the objects exported by the part defined by this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref> object.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects created by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> do not provide exported objects, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the exported objects provided by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> objects created by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref>.

Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the imports required by the part defined by this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref> object.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects created by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> do not have imports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> objects that describe the imports required by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> objects created by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref>.
Gets a collection of the metadata for this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref> object.

Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object instead.
A collection that contains the metadata for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref>.
The default is an empty, read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object.
